languages.text:
The Aeldari are supernaturally agile and can advance their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} skills regardless of their archetypes.
They also gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Эльдары сверхъестественно проворны и могут улучшать свои характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g}, а также навык {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательности{/g} независимо от своих архетипов.
Они также получают +15% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и +2 бонус к инициативе.

traits.locale_text:
The Aeldari are supernaturally agile and can advance their Agility, Perception and Awareness skills regardless of their class.
They also gain +15% dodge chance and +2 initiative.

languages.text:
Эльдары сверхъестественно проворны и могут улучшать свои характеристики {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g}, а также навык {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Наблюдательности{/g} независимо от своих архетипов.
Они также получают +15% к шансу {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и +2 бонус к инициативе.

traits.locale_text:
Эльдары сверхъестественно проворны и могут улучшать свои характеристики Ловкости и Восприятия, а также навык Наблюдательности независимо от своего класса.
Они также получают +15% к шансу Уклонения и +2 бонус к инициативе.

languages.text:
艾达灵族动作敏捷，异于常人。无论选择了怎样的职业，都可以对{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}属性、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}属性与{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}进行进阶。
此外，艾达灵族还会获得+15%{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}几率与+2{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}先攻{/g}值。

The Aeldari are supernaturally agile and can advance their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} regardless of their archetypes.
They also gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}.

艾达灵族动作敏捷，异于常人。无论选择了怎样的职业，都可以对{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}属性、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}属性与{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}警觉{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}进行进阶。

languages.text:
Los Aeldari tienen una agilidad sobrenatural y son capaces de avanzar su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g}, su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y sus {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g} independientemente de su arquetipo.
También ganan +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y +2 de {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}iniciativa{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Aeldari are supernaturally agile and can advance their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} regardless of their archetypes.
They also gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Los Aeldari tienen una agilidad sobrenatural y son capaces de avanzar su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y sus {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g} independientemente de su clase.
También ganan +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y +2 de iniciativa.

languages.text:
アエルダリは超人的な俊敏さを誇り、タイプに関わらず{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}を向上させることができる。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}率を+15%、{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}イニシアチブ{/g}を+2獲得する。
languages.original_text:
The Aeldari are supernaturally agile and can advance their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} regardless of their archetypes.
They also gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
アエルダリは超人的な俊敏さを誇り、クラスに関わらず{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}認識{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}を向上させることができる。
また、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}率を+15%、イニシアチブを+2獲得する。

languages.text:
Die Aeldari sind übernatürlich flink und können ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Bewusstheit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeiten{/g} ungeachtet ihres Archetyps vorantreiben.
Sie erhalten außerdem eine um +15 % erhöhte {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichchance{/g} und +2 {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}Initiative{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Aeldari are supernaturally agile and can advance their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} regardless of their archetypes.
They also gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Die Aeldari sind übernatürlich flink und können ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Achtsamkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fähigkeiten{/g} ungeachtet ihrer Klasse steigern.
Sie erhalten außerdem eine um +15 % erhöhte {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichchance{/g} und +2 Initiative.

languages.text:
Doués d'une agilité surnaturelle, les Aeldari peuvent améliorer leurs {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Vigilance{/g} compétences, indépendamment de leur archétype.
Ils bénéficient également de +15 % de chances d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de +2 d'{g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The Aeldari are supernaturally agile and can advance their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Awareness{/g} skills regardless of their archetypes.
They also gain +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} chance and +2 {g|Encyclopedia:InitiativeGlossary}initiative{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Doués d'une agilité surnaturelle, les Aeldari peuvent améliorer leurs {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétences{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Conscience{/g} indépendamment de leur classe.
Ils bénéficient également de +15 % de chances d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de +2 d'initiative.
